issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Add more info to the msgs printed in AbstractDelegationTokenSecretManager for better supportability

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
[HADOOP-13720] added more info to the msgs printed in {{AbstractDelegationTokenSecretManager}} for better supportability, which is good. Unfortunately the unit test {{TestDelegationTokenFetcher#testDelegationTokenWithoutRenewer}} that asserts the message string was not updated accordingly. The unit test is failing in both {{trunk}} and {{branch-2}} branches, see example builds [1|https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HDFS-11129?focusedCommentId=15657488&page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels:comment-tabpanel#comment-15657488], [2|https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HDFS-11130?focusedCommentId=15658086&page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels:comment-tabpanel#comment-15658086], and [3|https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HDFS-11117?focusedCommentId=15656939&page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels:comment-tabpanel#comment-15656939].

This JIRA is to track the effort of fixing this.

+1 pending jenkins.
